The Honda CR-V feels instantly familiar when you get behind the wheel, and it’s packed with features designed to make your life easier. Versatility, competency, and reliability are the tenets on which the CR-V is known for and it’s no stranger to luxury. The fluid lines of the CR-V were designed not only to create a sleek and dynamic look, but also to assist performance by channelling airflow, resulting in improved fuel economy.

For more information on this vehicle please contact 0877248729. **FACE LIFT MODEL**

**LEATHER INTERIOR**

The stylish fifth-generation Honda CR-V shares your spirit of adventure, and gives you the freedom and flexibility to explore the
world around you.The fluid lines of the CR-V were designed not only
to create a sleek and dynamic look, but also to assist performance by channelling airflow, resulting in improved fuel economy. The chrome garnish and rear skid plate provide the CR-V with an individual and purposeful look, while the door mirrors’ curved edges harmonise with theoverall design, reducing blind spots around the car. The dramatic window design provides superb all-round visibility and makes it a pleasure to be seen in.
